channel.title: The Flight of the Eisenstein
channel.description: Having witnessed the terrible massacre of Imperial forces on Isstvan III, Death Guard Captain Garro seizes a ship and sets a course for Terra to warn the Emperor of Horus's treachery. But when the fleeing Eisenstein is damaged by enemy fire, it becomes stranded in the warp - the realm of the Dark Powers.

item.title: The Flight of the Eisenstein Chapter 2
The Flight of the Eisenstein Chapter 1
